msgs.text: Hi bot
Hi. How can I help you?
I think I have a stroke
Sounds very serious! What makes you think you have a heart attack?
I feel pressure in my chest and unusual pain in my left hand
Please call immediately 911, it sounds like a real risk!!!! I can connect you to an emergency service right now. Make the connection?
yes
OK. Connecting. Please wait...
Good evening
Good evening Mr Victor
I have strange headaches lately, can it be a brain cancer?

There is a very little chance that headaches are caused by a cancer. Mostly it is a result of stress, insomnia or another common condition. I will ask you a few additional questions in order to understand better your symptoms and try to help. OK?
Yea, sure
Do you feel any additional unusual symptoms in addition to headaches?
Yes. I feel tired and nervous
How about your sleep habits? How much do you sleep per night (in average)?
Five hours, may be five and a half
Did you experiences any major change lately as new job, new baby born etc.?
Actually yes. A few weeks ago I got a new position and now I am major manager
Ohh, congratulations Victor. I hope you will enjoy from your new role. Anyway it looks you are a little bit under stress which can cause headaches and nervousness
